pages.text: To get into making sushi, you will need a few things: $(li)Sushi Go Crafting's Cutting Board $(li)Cleaver Knife $(li)Roller $(li)Rice Cooker $(li)Cooler Box $(br2)While this entry is in progress, please use Sushi Go Crafting's patchouli guidebook. Recipe is on the next page.

pages.title: Sushi Book!
pages.text: You will need to find some Seaweed in the ocean biome in order to craft this book.
